message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1300000. It's a fantastic deal considering its value to you, and I'm confident this will be a mutually beneficial arrangement. Let me know your thoughts!

Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product to you, but based on my budget, I am only able to consider offers up to $1200000. I hope we can find a price that works for both of us.
